--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

 
> Hydras/Perceptor
> 
> Perceptor looked to dark Rodimus and said "LEt's go to check this 
> place, he must have had other gifts around"
> 
> Hydras opened comlink to TRelos and said "TRelos have you found 
> something?" and looking to Jhiaxus and Zarak said "Be ready we 
> couldnt know what kindo of gifts the intruder left us"

The spider that Trelos found vanished in a puff of fine black powder,
soething like soot as is discoporates in death.

If the two remaining Spider Spies had true sparks they would be afraid.
Instead they attempted to perform thier funtion, shutting themselves
down to minimum power as they hid themselves along the cielings behind
support beams hopefully out of easy view. One is near to the shuttle
bay and the other near the area where Hydras and crew had been
planning. 

Unfortunately they have no cloaking technology, relying only on small
size and quick agility to keep them out of harms way. (they are
approximatley 1/2 the size of a Cybertronian's hand, maybe a little
smaller) Thier programming is limited and for they moment they are
content to monitor, hoping not to be found.

OOC: Again anyone with the correct sensory equipment could find them. 

Preston
